sentence.Network_en: Oxford, as Evelyn Waugh astutely observed, is a city best seen in early summer.
sentence.Network_cn: 牛津城，正如伊夫林·沃的敏锐观察，初夏的时候最美。

sentence.Network_en: That was what Ada Quonsetf astutely intended.
sentence.Network_cn: 这正是艾达·昆赛脱狡狯之处.

sentence.Network_en: Freemantle had an idea that the TV session, astutely managed , might well develop into a show.
sentence.Network_cn: 弗里曼特却自有主意, 只要安排得巧妙, 电视采访完全可以变成一次示威.

list.abs: Williamson valves are of the highest quality standards , are competitively priced , and are producedwith ultra-modern manufacturing technology and astute materials sourcing .威廉姆森阀门产品具有优良的质量、竞争性的价格、先进的生产技术和灵活的材料资源。
he is an astute businessman [ lawyer ] .他是一个精明的商人[律师]。
Even if the most astute consumer , also hard to avoid is broken ., 即使是最精明的消费者 , 也难免一失.
政治上机敏(Politically astute) 要确切了解组织的权力结构, . 仔细听取尤其是从最有力的团组来的忧虑,并且要知道往哪分配他们需.

entry.def: If you describe someone as astute, you think they show an understanding of behaviour and situations, and are skilful at using this knowledge to their own advantage.

example.ex: He made a series of astute business decisions.
example.tran: 他作出了一系列精明的商业决策。

auth_sentence.content: It appears as though Fenlon has rebuilt astutely.

auth_sentence.content: He discharged it well and politically astutely.
